name: IconSelectorWrapperComponent

inputsClass.name: iconSize
inputsClass.rawdescription: The displayed icon size, the value has to be multiple of 8.
inputsClass.description: The displayed icon size, the value has to be multiple of 8.

description:
A component which acts as a wrapper for the icon selector.

Example 1:

Example :
<c8y-icon-selector-wrapper
[selectedIcon]="'water'"
(onSelect)="selectIcon($event)"
></c8y-icon-selector-wrapper>

OR as a part of a formGroup Example 2:

Example :
<c8y-icon-selector-wrapper name="icon" formControlName="icon">
</c8y-icon-selector-wrapper>
rawdescription:
A component which acts as a wrapper for the icon selector.

Example 1:
```
<c8y-icon-selector-wrapper
[selectedIcon]="'water'"
(onSelect)="selectIcon($event)"
></c8y-icon-selector-wrapper>
```
OR as a part of a formGroup
Example 2:
```
<c8y-icon-selector-wrapper name="icon" formControlName="icon">
</c8y-icon-selector-wrapper>
```
